title: The perfect movie
review: Truly awesome. The acting, the story, the sets, the editing. Truly awesome. Cant wait for part 2

title: Intense and grounded
review: Most of these types of movies seem to be aaaaalmost grounded but you leave the theatre thinking it really couldn't have happened to me/in our world. But this movie allows that feeling. A great job.

title: Best Ashton movie
review: If you are a Kutcher fan this is his best non comedy movie. Also this specifically is great but the other films in the series...skip
